raw-sql.name: default
raw-sql.query: select order_id, count(*) as total_items, sum(order_qty*unit_price) as total_amount from o_order_detail group by order_id

raw-sql.name: withMax
raw-sql.query: select order_id, count(*) as total_items, sum(order_qty*unit_price) as total_amount, max(order_qty*unit_price) as maxAmount from o_order_detail group by order_id

raw-sql.name: withParam
raw-sql.query: select order_id, count(*) as totalItems, sum(order_qty*unit_price) as totalAmount, max(order_qty*unit_price) as maxAmount from o_order_detail where id > :minId group by order_id

raw-sql.name: myRawTest
raw-sql.query: select o.id, o.status, o.ship_date, c.id, c.name, a.id, a.line1, a.line2, a.city from o_order o join o_customer c on o.customer_id = c.id join o_address a on c.billing_address_id = a.id where o.status = :orderStatus order by c.name, c.id

named-query.name: withContactsById
named-query.query: select (name, version) fetch contacts (firstName, lastName, email) where id = :id
